Data arrangement:
```{r}
data <- `TheInfluenceOfEarlyA_DATA_2022-` %>% filter(is.na(lost_of_followup))
data$family_Atopic_diseases_sum <- rowSums(data[,15:50])
data$mother_Atopic_diseases_sum <- rowSums(data[,15:20])
data$father_Atopic_diseases_sum <- rowSums(data[,21:26])
data$sibling_Atopic_diseases_sum <- rowSums(data[,27:50])

data <- data %>% mutate(family_Atopic_diseases = ifelse(family_Atopic_diseases_sum >0,1,0), mother_Atopic_diseases = ifelse(mother_Atopic_diseases_sum>0,1,0), father_Atopic_diseases = ifelse(father_Atopic_diseases_sum > 0, 1,0), sibling_Atopic_diseases = ifelse(sibling_Atopic_diseases_sum > 0 ,1, 0)) %>% select(-c(family_Atopic_diseases_sum, mother_Atopic_diseases_sum, father_Atopic_diseases_sum, sibling_Atopic_diseases_sum))


Complete_follow_up <- data %>% filter(month_survey_complete == 2)
```
